title: my tablet was stolen :(
body:
i had my tablet in my backpack and had my backpack on my bike in the break room.  when i got back from lunch my backpack was open and the tablet was gone.  theres no cameras in the break room, and almost everyone working was out on break with me.  suspects are the manager, a couple cashiers, and the main suspect is the truck driver.  the manager says there was a 10 minute window when no one was in the back room since he got called to the registers, giving the truck driver ample time and opportunity to walk through the stock room to the break room and look through our things.  

the driver was also acting kinda suspicious after lunch, before lunch he was being a dick all morning, and even bitched at us for having to take a lunch break.  after lunch he was super friendly, and helped us clean up after we finished unloading the truck.
